attributes.action: Respect the UK decision to leave the EU.
attributes.additional_details: Evidence: the news! Labour Party public focus on forcing their leader out simply because the politicians didn't want to leave and now they are bitter. Conservative party obsessed on who will be the next leader, let Cameron get on with the next few months, the EU leaders are being bullies! Ignore them and focus on the job at hand.
attributes.background: The U.K. people have decided to leave the EU. The action now needs carrying out in a positive fashion. All parties have been fighting and not focusing on the job at hand, this petition is requesting that all parties unite behind the uk people's position and stop internal battling.
